alternates: Navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates

keyMoments.description: Uses Mirage Tempo: Fata Morgana for the first time, creating five different illusions to confuse Kalifa
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates advanced mastery of the Perfect Clima-Tact and weather-based illusion techniques

keyMoments.description: Defeats Kalifa with Thunder Lance Tempo, sending a horizontal lightning bolt that knocks out the CP9 agent
keyMoments.significance: First major solo victory against an elite government assassin, marking her evolution as a serious combatant

keyMoments.description: Retrieves Kalifa's key and uses it to free Zoro and Sogeking from their Sea Prism Stone handcuffs
keyMoments.significance: Enables her crewmates to fight at full strength against their CP9 opponents

abilities.name: Mirage Tempo: Fata Morgana
abilities.description: Creates five different illusions using temperature differentials and light refraction, each capable of replicating attacks

abilities.name: Thunder Lance Tempo
abilities.description: Sends a devastating horizontal lightning bolt from dark clouds through the Perfect Clima-Tact

keyMoments.description: Uses Hitsuji Gumo Tidal Wave to sweep the entire bathroom with power-draining soap bubbles
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the full scale of her Awa Awa no Mi abilities

keyMoments.description: Defeated by Nami's Thunder Lance Tempo and rendered unconscious
keyMoments.significance: First CP9 member to be defeated by a Straw Hat crew member at Enies Lobby

abilities.name: Hitsuji Gumo Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Creates a massive tidal wave of power-draining soap bubbles that can affect an entire room

keyMoments.description: Blasted into the sea by Franky's Coup de Vent to end his Monster Point rampage
keyMoments.significance: Saves Chopper's life by forcing him out of the dangerous Monster Point transformation

keyMoments.description: Returns to normal form upon hitting seawater, ending the Monster Point transformation
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the strategic use of Devil Fruit weaknesses to counter dangerous transformations

keyMoments.description: Decides to blast Monster Point Chopper into the sea to save him from the transformation's life-threatening effects
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates tactical thinking and willingness to make difficult decisions for the crew's safety

keyMoments.description: Uses Coup de Vent to blast Chopper through the tower wall and into the sea
keyMoments.significance: First use of Coup de Vent for rescue purposes rather than pure offense

keyMoments.description: Dives into the sea after Chopper to rescue him from drowning
keyMoments.significance: Shows his heroic nature and commitment to protecting the Straw Hats, foreshadowing his eventual joining

keyMoments.description: Freed from Sea Prism Stone handcuffs by Nami using Kalifa's key
keyMoments.significance: Finally able to fight Kaku at full strength after being handicapped by handcuffs

keyMoments.description: As Sogeking, freed from Sea Prism Stone handcuffs by Nami using Kalifa's key
keyMoments.significance: Finally separated from Zoro, allowing both to fight more effectively
